articles.title: Yemen's Houthis threaten escalation after American strike using 5,000-pound bunker-buster bomb - CBS News
articles.description: The Iran-backed Houthis threaten to escalate attacks on Red Sea shipping after strikes by the U.S. and U.K. that the rebels say killed 16 people.
articles.content: Hodeida, Yemen — Yemen's Iran-backed Houthis on Friday threatened to escalate attacks on Red Sea shipping after overnight strikes by the United States and Britain that the rebels said killed 16 peopl… [+4527 chars]
